ExperienceList.description: Acquired advanced knowledge in Deep Learning through Andrew Ng's Coursera specialization, with expertise in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation, using TensorFlow and Keras for model implementation and training.

Gained expertise in building AI recommendation engines from scratch, along with developing efficient REST APIs for Machine Learning model deployment, showcasing backend development skills using Django and Docker for seamless deployment.

Demonstrated proficiency in cloud-based solutions by successfully deploying a static website created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on Azure Cloud, hosting it through a Virtual Machine for efficient management and scalability.
